body:
You didnt leave much room for critique!! Your project was perfect and followed most standard practices :)

Great job on this project and all the best for the future ones :smile: :thumbsup:
Excellent job using all the comments! It is a very good habit to have. Helps you a lot when you are working on a large project with multiple developers :)
Perfect job laying out the grid :)

Hey my name is Mani and I will be reviewing your project today :) 

If there are any mistakes in the review do let me know in the feedback and I will see to it that it is corrected. It will also help me greatly to be a better reviewer :) 

If you find the review helpful it will be awesome if you leave a feedback and let me know if  I am on the right track and was helpful :)
